feed.title: Napleton Chicago Chevy Buick GMC Inventory Feed

entry.title: 2025 Hyundai Sonata SE
entry.ns0:description:
The Napleton Auto Group promotes a no pressure buying experience that puts the customer in charge of the buying process, and for over 80 years, the Napleton family has made sure that absolutely nothing is more important than our commitment to your satisfaction. Our staff members are professional in every sense of the word, and receive regular training, including factory certification, so they are truly knowledgeable about the vehicles we offer. We want every customer's experience to be as timely, comfortable and ultimately as satisfying as it possible can be. You'll see it in every department of every Napleton Auto Group dealership. We hope you'll join the thousands of other satisfied customers that buy and service their vehicles the Napleton way. No Accidents! One Owner! This 2025 Hyundai Sonata SE offered in Abyss Black will make a great addition to your family or business! Be sure to take note of all this vehicle has to offer:

Option Group 01

    Convenience

    • Distance pacing cruise control with traffic stop-go. Set it and forget it. Road trips used to be stressful. Cruise control only managed speed, but not distance or safety. Now, with Distance pacing cruise control with traffic stop-go, simply set your desired speed and let sensor technology maintain a safe distance between you and the vehicle ahead. It's stop/go feature automatically brings the vehicle to a stop if traffic stops and resumes distance pacing cruise when traffic starts to move again. Distance pacing cruise control with traffic stop-go; your ultimate co-pilot.

    Safety and Security

    • Hands-on cruise control. Set it and forget it. Road trips used to be stressful. Cruise control only managed speed, but not distance or safety. Now, with hands-on cruise control, simply set your desired speed and let sensor technology maintain a safe distance between you and surrounding vehicles. It slows you down; speeds you up and even keeps you in your own lane. Meet your ultimate co-pilot with hands-on cruise control.
    • Pedestrian impact prevention - An extra step toward safety. Pedestrians don't always stop, look, and listen, but with Pedestrian Impact Prevention, your vehicle is equipped to better see them and avoid them. This system constantly monitors the road ahead to identify and track pedestrians. It projects that image to an interior display screen, AND should an impact become likely, Pedestrian impact prevention takes steps to avoid a collision.
    • Brake assist - Stop right there. Something jumps out into the middle of the road and you need to stop now! With brake assist, you will. It uses the speed of the brake pedal's travel to sense panic braking, then applies all available power to boost your stopping power. Brake assist can stop the accident before it is one.

    Technology and Telematics

    • Apple CarPlay & Android Auto smart device wireless mirroring
    Other notable features: Napleton Downtown Chevrolet Buick GMC is proud to serve customers in communities throughout the Chicagoland area. Give us a call at 312-588-9421 or stop by to test drive your new car, truck, or SUV today! 2720 S. Michigan Ave. Chicago IL 60616 Napleton Autos Online Pricing Disclaimer Certified Pre-Owned and used inventory is offered for sale to the public. Pricing indicated as "The Napleton Price" includes all applicable dealer discounts and/or manufacturer's incentives, and does not include any tax, title, doc fee, license, optional equipment costs and/or dealer installed add-on items selected by the customer at the time of sale. Destination charges may vary by model and are included in pricing. All pricing is subject to change without notice. Napleton Auto Group utilizes this website, as well as 3rd party websites, to market and advertise our inventory online. All pricing is subject to the availability of that exact vehicle, as indicated by the Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) and dealer stock number. The pricing reflected on this website, www.napleton.autos, represents the most current and accurate pricing for Napleton Auto Group. In the event of a discrepancy in pricing between this website and any 3rd party website, this website will be considered the most current and accurate price and supersedes any and all other advertised prices. While great effort is made to ensure the accuracy of the information on this site, errors do occur, so please verify all information with a Napleton Auto Group Client Advisor.

entry.title: 2025 Chevrolet Silverado 1500 Work Truck
entry.ns0:description:
The Napleton Auto Group promotes a no pressure buying experience that puts the customer in charge of the buying process, and for over 80 years, the Napleton family has made sure that absolutely nothing is more important than our commitment to your satisfaction. Our staff members are professional in every sense of the word, and receive regular training, including factory certification, so they are truly knowledgeable about the vehicles we offer. We want every customer's experience to be as timely, comfortable and ultimately as satisfying as it possible can be. You'll see it in every department of every Napleton Auto Group dealership. We hope you'll join the thousands of other satisfied customers that buy and service their vehicles the Napleton way. This 2025 Chevrolet Silverado 1500 Work Truck offered in Summit White will make a great addition to your family or business! Be sure to take note of all this vehicle has to offer:

WT Convenience Package

  • Deep-Tinted Glass
  • Electric Rear-Window Defogger

WT Value Package ($460 value)

  • Trailering Package

Preferred Equipment Group 1WT

  • 4-Way Manual Driver Seat Adjuster
  • Locking Tailgate
  • Power Front Windows with Passenger Express Down
  • Solar Absorbing Tinted Glass
  • Remote Keyless Entry
  • Power Front Windows with Driver Express Up/down
  • 40/20/40 Front Split Bench Seat
  • Rubberized-Vinyl Floor Covering
  • Bluetooth For Phone
  • Inside Rearview Mirror with Tilt
  • Heated Power-Adjustable Outside Mirrors
  • Electronic Cruise Control
  • TurboMax Engine
  • Manual Tilt Wheel Steering Column
  • Single-Speed Transfer Case
  • Chevy Safety Assist
  • 255/70R17 AS BW Tires
  • Standard Tailgate
  • Manual Tailgate Function Delete
  • 17" X 8" Ultra Silver Painted Steel Wheels
  • Vinyl Seat Trim
  • Teen Driver
  • SiriusXM Delete
  • 3.5" Monochromatic Display Driver Info Center
  • OnStar Services Capable
  • Tire Pressure Monitoring System
  • HD Rear Vision Camera
  • Front Frame-Mounted Black Recovery Hooks
  • Black (semi-Gloss) Front Bumper
  • Black (semi-Gloss) Rear Bumper

Snow Plow Prep Package ($425 value)

  • Heavy-Duty Air Filter
  • 220 Amp Alternator
  • Skid Plates

Safety and Security

  • Forward collision mitigation - Forward thinking. You look away for just a second and suddenly the vehicle in front of you has stopped. That's when the forward collision mitigation system comes to life. When it senses an impending impact, it will activate a combination of features to help prevent or reduce the severity of an accident. Forward collision mitigation is always looking ahead.
  • Pedestrian impact prevention - An extra step toward safety. Pedestrians don't always stop, look, and listen, but with Pedestrian Impact Prevention, your vehicle is equipped to better see them and avoid them. This system constantly monitors the road ahead to identify and track pedestrians. It projects that image to an interior display screen, AND should an impact become likely, Pedestrian impact prevention takes steps to avoid a collision.
  • Rear camera - Watching your back! The rear camera helps you see obstacles and hazards you otherwise couldn't by showing enhanced images of what is behind you. The rear camera is an extra set of eyes that's both convenient and safe.

Technology and Telematics

  • Apple CarPlay/Android Auto smart device wireless mirroring
  • Mobile hotspot - WiFi on the fly. Connect your devices to the Internet through your vehicle's private mobile hotspot and take the internet wherever your journey takes you, without eating up your data allowance. Find the hotspot with mobile hotspot.
Other notable features: Come and check out our full selection of new vehicles! Napleton Downtown Chevrolet is proud to serve customers in communities throughout the Chicagoland area. Give us a call at 312-588-9421 or stop by to test drive your new car, truck, or SUV today! 2720 S. Michigan Ave. Chicago IL 60616 Napleton Autos Online Pricing Disclaimer New vehicle inventory is offered for sale at the Manufacturer's Suggested Retail Price (MSRP), as set by General Motors and/or General Motors Financial. Prices labeled as the "Napleton Price" include all eligible dealer discounts and/or manufacturer incentives and do not include taxes, title, license fees, documentation fees, optional equipment, or dealer-installed accessories selected by the customer at the time of purchase. Destination charges may vary by model and are included in the displayed pricing. All pricing is subject to change without notice based on manufacturer program updates, incentive eligibility, or market conditions. Napleton Autos advertises its inventory on this website, www.napleton.autos, as well as on third-party advertising platforms. Pricing is specific to each vehicle, identified by its Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) and dealer stock number. The pricing shown on www.napleton.autos represents the most current and accurate pricing for Napleton Autos. In the event of any discrepancy between this website and any third-party website, the pricing displayed on www.napleton.autos will be considered the most accurate and will supersede all other advertised prices. While every effort is made to ensure the accuracy of the information on this site, errors may occur. Please verify all information with a Napleton Autos Client Advisor. It slows you down; speeds you up and even keeps you in your own lane. Meet your ultimate co-pilot with hands-on cruise control.
    • Pedestrian impact prevention - An extra step toward safety. Pedestrians don't always stop, look, and listen, but with Pedestrian Impact Prevention, your vehicle is equipped to better see them and avoid them. This system constantly monitors the road ahead to identify and track pedestrians. It projects that image to an interior display screen, AND should an impact become likely, Pedestrian impact prevention takes steps to avoid a collision.
    • Brake assist - Stop right there. Something jumps out into the middle of the road and you need to stop now! With brake assist, you will. It uses the speed of the brake pedal's travel to sense panic braking, then applies all available power to boost your stopping power. Brake assist can stop the accident before it is one.

    Technology and Telematics

    • Apple CarPlay & Android Auto smart device wireless mirroring

    • Forward collision mitigation - Forward thinking. You look away for just a second and suddenly the vehicle in front of you has stopped. That's when the forward collision mitigation system comes to life. When it senses an impending impact, it will activate a combination of features to help prevent or reduce the severity of an accident. Forward collision mitigation is always looking ahead.
    • Pedestrian impact prevention - An extra step toward safety. Pedestrians don't always stop, look, and listen, but with Pedestrian Impact Prevention, your vehicle is equipped to better see them and avoid them. This system constantly monitors the road ahead to identify and track pedestrians. It projects that image to an interior display screen, AND should an impact become likely, Pedestrian impact prevention takes steps to avoid a collision.
    • Rear camera - Watching your back! The rear camera helps you see obstacles and hazards you otherwise couldn't by showing enhanced images of what is behind you. The rear camera is an extra set of eyes that's both convenient and safe.
    • Lane departure prevention - Keep it between the lines. It only takes a moment of inattention for your vehicle to drift. With lane departure prevention, your vehicle takes corrective action to help you avoid unintentionally moving out of your lane. Lane departure prevention is an extra level of safety for you and those around you.

    Technology and Telematics

    • Mobile hotspot - WiFi on the fly. Connect your devices to the Internet through your vehicle's private mobile hotspot and take the internet wherever your journey takes you, without eating up your data allowance. Find the hotspot with mobile hotspot.
    Other notable features: Come and check out our full selection of new vehicles! Napleton Downtown Chevrolet is proud to serve customers in communities throughout the Chicagoland area. This 2023 Kia Telluride S offered in Glacial White Pearl will make a great addition to your family or business! Be sure to take note of all this vehicle has to offer:

Convenience

  • GPS linked cruise control - Set it and forget it. Road trips used to be stressful, until GPS linked cruise control set the pace. Simply set the desired speed and the system uses GPS navigation data to maintain that speed without driver intervention - including slowing down for curves and anticipating hills. This can help minimize driver fatigue and improve overall fuel economy. Meet your ultimate co-pilot; GPS linked cruise control.

Safety and Security

  • Pedestrian impact prevention - An extra step toward safety. Pedestrians don't always stop, look, and listen, but with Pedestrian Impact Prevention, your vehicle is equipped to better see them and avoid them. This system constantly monitors the road ahead to identify and track pedestrians. It projects that image to an interior display screen, AND should an impact become likely, Pedestrian impact prevention takes steps to avoid a collision.
  • Pedestrian impact prevention - An extra step toward safety. Pedestrians don't always stop, look, and listen, but with Pedestrian Impact Prevention, your vehicle is equipped to better see them and avoid them. This system constantly monitors the road ahead to identify and track pedestrians. It projects that image to an interior display screen, AND should an impact become likely, Pedestrian impact prevention takes steps to avoid a collision.
  • Hands-on cruise control. Set it and forget it. Road trips used to be stressful. Cruise control only managed speed, but not distance or safety. Now, with hands-on cruise control, simply set your desired speed and let sensor technology maintain a safe distance between you and surrounding vehicles. It slows you down; speeds you up and even keeps you in your own lane. Meet your ultimate co-pilot with hands-on cruise control.

Technology and Telematics

  • Smart device mirroring - Smartphone, meet smart car. You can control your device through your vehicle's infotainment system. Smart device mirroring brings together safety and convenience by making it easier to find what you're looking for while keeping your eyes on the road.

  • 4-Way Power Front Passenger Lumbar Seat Adjuster

Safety and Security

  • Forward collision mitigation - Forward thinking. You look away for just a second and suddenly the vehicle in front of you has stopped. That's when the forward collision mitigation system comes to life. When it senses an impending impact, it will activate a combination of features to help prevent or reduce the severity of an accident. Forward collision mitigation is always looking ahead.
  • Pedestrian impact prevention - An extra step toward safety. Pedestrians don't always stop, look, and listen, but with Pedestrian Impact Prevention, your vehicle is equipped to better see them and avoid them. This system constantly monitors the road ahead to identify and track pedestrians. It projects that image to an interior display screen, AND should an impact become likely, Pedestrian impact prevention takes steps to avoid a collision.
  • Rear camera with washer - Watching your back! The rear camera helps you see obstacles and hazards you otherwise couldn't by showing enhanced images of what is behind you. Even if there are sloppy conditions, the washer keeps the camera's view clean. Rear camera with washer is an extra set of eyes that's both convenient and safe

Technology and Telematics

  • Apple CarPlay/Android Auto smart device wireless mirroring
  • Mobile hotspot - WiFi on the fly. Connect your devices to the Internet through your vehicle's private mobile hotspot and take the internet wherever your journey takes you, without eating up your data allowance. Find the hotspot with mobile hotspot.

entry.title: 2023 Hyundai Tucson SEL
entry.ns0:description:
The Napleton Auto Group promotes a no pressure buying experience that puts the customer in charge of the buying process, and for over 80 years, the Napleton family has made sure that absolutely nothing is more important than our commitment to your satisfaction. Our staff members are professional in every sense of the word, and receive regular training, including factory certification, so they are truly knowledgeable about the vehicles we offer. We want every customer's experience to be as timely, comfortable and ultimately as satisfying as it possible can be. You'll see it in every department of every Napleton Auto Group dealership. We hope you'll join the thousands of other satisfied customers that buy and service their vehicles the Napleton way. No Accidents! One Owner! This 2023 Hyundai Tucson SEL offered in Intense Blue will make a great addition to your family or business! Be sure to take note of all this vehicle has to offer:

Option Group 01

    Convenience

    • Distance pacing cruise control with traffic stop-go. Set it and forget it. Road trips used to be stressful. Cruise control only managed speed, but not distance or safety. Now, with Distance pacing cruise control with traffic stop-go, simply set your desired speed and let sensor technology maintain a safe distance between you and the vehicle ahead. It's stop/go feature automatically brings the vehicle to a stop if traffic stops and resumes distance pacing cruise when traffic starts to move again. Distance pacing cruise control with traffic stop-go; your ultimate co-pilot.

    Safety and Security

    • Hands-on cruise control. Set it and forget it. Road trips used to be stressful. Cruise control only managed speed, but not distance or safety. Now, with hands-on cruise control, simply set your desired speed and let sensor technology maintain a safe distance between you and surrounding vehicles. It slows you down; speeds you up and even keeps you in your own lane. Meet your ultimate co-pilot with hands-on cruise control.
    • Pedestrian impact prevention - An extra step toward safety. Pedestrians don't always stop, look, and listen, but with Pedestrian Impact Prevention, your vehicle is equipped to better see them and avoid them. This system constantly monitors the road ahead to identify and track pedestrians. It projects that image to an interior display screen, AND should an impact become likely, Pedestrian impact prevention takes steps to avoid a collision.
    • Brake assist - Stop right there. Something jumps out into the middle of the road and you need to stop now! With brake assist, you will. It uses the speed of the brake pedal's travel to sense panic braking, then applies all available power to boost your stopping power. Brake assist can stop the accident before it is one.

    Technology and Telematics

    • Apple CarPlay & Android Auto smart device wireless mirroring
    Other notable features: OPTION GROUP 01, INTENSE BLUE, BLACK, STAIN & ODOR RESISTANT CLOTH SEAT TRIM, FRONT AND REAR MUDGUARDS, CARPETED FLOOR MATS, CARGO TRAY, ROOF RACK CROSS RAILS Napleton Downtown Chevrolet Buick GMC is proud to serve customers in communities throughout the Chicagoland area. entry.ns0:description:
The Napleton Auto Group promotes a no pressure buying experience that puts the customer in charge of the buying process, and for over 80 years, the Napleton family has made sure that absolutely nothing is more important than our commitment to your satisfaction. Our staff members are professional in every sense of the word, and receive regular training, including factory certification, so they are truly knowledgeable about the vehicles we offer. We want every customer's experience to be as timely, comfortable and ultimately as satisfying as it possible can be. You'll see it in every department of every Napleton Auto Group dealership. We hope you'll join the thousands of other satisfied customers that buy and service their vehicles the Napleton way. This 2019 Subaru Impreza Premium offered in Dark Blue Pearl will make a great addition to your family or business! Be sure to take note of all this vehicle has to offer:

EyeSight and Blind Spot and Rear Cross Traffic Alert ($1,395 value)

  • Blind Spot Detection (BSD)
  • EyeSight System
  • Rear Cross Traffic Alert (RCTA)
  • Steering Responsive Fog Lights (SRF)

Safety and Security

  • Forward collision mitigation - Forward thinking. You look away for just a second and suddenly the vehicle in front of you has stopped. That's when the forward collision mitigation system comes to life. When it senses an impending impact, it will activate a combination of features to help prevent or reduce the severity of an accident. Forward collision mitigation is always looking ahead.
  • Pedestrian impact prevention - An extra step toward safety. Pedestrians don't always stop, look, and listen, but with Pedestrian Impact Prevention, your vehicle is equipped to better see them and avoid them. This system constantly monitors the road ahead to identify and track pedestrians. It projects that image to an interior display screen, AND should an impact become likely, Pedestrian impact prevention takes steps to avoid a collision.
  • Rear camera - Watching your back! The rear camera helps you see obstacles and hazards you otherwise couldn't by showing enhanced images of what is behind you. The rear camera is an extra set of eyes that's both convenient and safe.
  • Lane departure prevention - Keep it between the lines. It only takes a moment of inattention for your vehicle to drift. With lane departure prevention, your vehicle takes corrective action to help you avoid unintentionally moving out of your lane. Lane departure prevention is an extra level of safety for you and those around you.

Technology and Telematics

  • Smart device mirroring - Smartphone, meet smart car. You can control your device through your vehicle's infotainment system. Smart device mirroring brings together safety and convenience by making it easier to find what you're looking for while keeping your eyes on the road.
Other notable features: EYESIGHT & BSD/RCTA & SRF, DARK BLUE PEARL, IVORY, CLOTH UPHOLSTERY, ALLOY WHEEL LOCKS, SPLASH GUARDS, REAR BUMPER APPLIQUE, ALL-WEATHER FLOOR LINERS Napleton Downtown Chevrolet is proud to serve customers in communities throughout the Chicagoland area. Driver Confidence Package ($795 value)

  • Adaptive Cruise Control
  • Rear Park Assist
  • Rear Cross Traffic Alert
  • Lane Change Alert with Side Blind Zone Alert

Preferred Equipment Group 1SA

    Safety and Security

    • Forward collision mitigation - Forward thinking. You look away for just a second and suddenly the vehicle in front of you has stopped. That's when the forward collision mitigation system comes to life. When it senses an impending impact, it will activate a combination of features to help prevent or reduce the severity of an accident. Forward collision mitigation is always looking ahead.
    • Pedestrian impact prevention - An extra step toward safety. Pedestrians don't always stop, look, and listen, but with Pedestrian Impact Prevention, your vehicle is equipped to better see them and avoid them. This system constantly monitors the road ahead to identify and track pedestrians. It projects that image to an interior display screen, AND should an impact become likely, Pedestrian impact prevention takes steps to avoid a collision.
    • Rear camera - Watching your back! The rear camera helps you see obstacles and hazards you otherwise couldn't by showing enhanced images of what is behind you. The rear camera is an extra set of eyes that's both convenient and safe.
    • Lane departure prevention - Keep it between the lines. It only takes a moment of inattention for your vehicle to drift. With lane departure prevention, your vehicle takes corrective action to help you avoid unintentionally moving out of your lane. Lane departure prevention is an extra level of safety for you and those around you.

    Technology and Telematics

    • Mobile hotspot - WiFi on the fly. Connect your devices to the Internet through your vehicle's private mobile hotspot and take the internet wherever your journey takes you, without eating up your data allowance. Find the hotspot with mobile hotspot.

    Convenience

    • Distance pacing cruise control with traffic stop-go. Set it and forget it. Road trips used to be stressful. Cruise control only managed speed, but not distance or safety. Now, with Distance pacing cruise control with traffic stop-go, simply set your desired speed and let sensor technology maintain a safe distance between you and the vehicle ahead. It's stop/go feature automatically brings the vehicle to a stop if traffic stops and resumes distance pacing cruise when traffic starts to move again. Distance pacing cruise control with traffic stop-go; your ultimate co-pilot.

    Safety and Security

    • Hands-on cruise control. Set it and forget it. Road trips used to be stressful. Cruise control only managed speed, but not distance or safety.     • Pedestrian impact prevention - An extra step toward safety. Pedestrians don't always stop, look, and listen, but with Pedestrian Impact Prevention, your vehicle is equipped to better see them and avoid them. This system constantly monitors the road ahead to identify and track pedestrians. It projects that image to an interior display screen, AND should an impact become likely, Pedestrian impact prevention takes steps to avoid a collision.
    • Brake assist - Stop right there. Something jumps out into the middle of the road and you need to stop now! With brake assist, you will. It uses the speed of the brake pedal's travel to sense panic braking, then applies all available power to boost your stopping power. Brake assist can stop the accident before it is one.

Safety and Security

  • Forward collision mitigation - Forward thinking. You look away for just a second and suddenly the vehicle in front of you has stopped. That's when the forward collision mitigation system comes to life. When it senses an impending impact, it will activate a combination of features to help prevent or reduce the severity of an accident. Forward collision mitigation is always looking ahead.
  • Forward collision mitigation - Forward thinking. You look away for just a second and suddenly the vehicle in front of you has stopped. That's when the forward collision mitigation system comes to life. When it senses an impending impact, it will activate a combination of features to help prevent or reduce the severity of an accident. Forward collision mitigation is always looking ahead.
  • Pedestrian impact prevention - An extra step toward safety. Pedestrians don't always stop, look, and listen, but with Pedestrian Impact Prevention, your vehicle is equipped to better see them and avoid them. This system constantly monitors the road ahead to identify and track pedestrians. It projects that image to an interior display screen, AND should an impact become likely, Pedestrian impact prevention takes steps to avoid a collision.

Technology and Telematics

entry.ns0:description:
The Napleton Auto Group promotes a no pressure buying experience that puts the customer in charge of the buying process, and for over 80 years, the Napleton family has made sure that absolutely nothing is more important than our commitment to your satisfaction. Our staff members are professional in every sense of the word, and receive regular training, including factory certification, so they are truly knowledgeable about the vehicles we offer. We want every customer's experience to be as timely, comfortable and ultimately as satisfying as it possible can be. You'll see it in every department of every Napleton Auto Group dealership. We hope you'll join the thousands of other satisfied customers that buy and service their vehicles the Napleton way. This 2026 Buick Envista Sport Touring offered in Ocean Blue Metallic will make a great addition to your family or business! Be sure to take note of all this vehicle has to offer:

Convenience I Package ($895 value)

  • 8-Way Power Driver Seat Adjuster
  • 2-Way Power Driver Lumbar Control
  • Front Doors Keyless Open
  • Heated Driver and Front Passenger Seats
  • Heated Steering Wheel

Convenience II Package ($595 value)

  • Front Intermittent Rainsense Wipers
  • Wireless Charging
  • Power Liftgate

Preferred Equipment Group G03

    Safety and Security

    • Forward collision mitigation - Forward thinking. You look away for just a second and suddenly the vehicle in front of you has stopped. That's when the forward collision mitigation system comes to life. When it senses an impending impact, it will activate a combination of features to help prevent or reduce the severity of an accident. Forward collision mitigation is always looking ahead.
    • Pedestrian impact prevention - An extra step toward safety. Pedestrians don't always stop, look, and listen, but with Pedestrian Impact Prevention, your vehicle is equipped to better see them and avoid them. This system constantly monitors the road ahead to identify and track pedestrians. It projects that image to an interior display screen, AND should an impact become likely, Pedestrian impact prevention takes steps to avoid a collision.
    • Rear camera - Watching your back! The rear camera helps you see obstacles and hazards you otherwise couldn't by showing enhanced images of what is behind you. The rear camera is an extra set of eyes that's both convenient and safe.

    Technology and Telematics

    • Wireless Apple CarPlay/Wireless Android Auto smart device wireless mirroring
    • Mobile hotspot - WiFi on the fly. Connect your devices to the Internet through your vehicle's private mobile hotspot and take the internet wherever your journey takes you, without eating up your data allowance. Find the hotspot with mobile hotspot.
    Other notable features: EMISSIONS, FEDERAL REQUIREMENTS, ENGINE, ECOTEC 1.2L TURBO DOHC DI WITH VARIABLE VALVE TIMING (VVT), E85-COMPATIBLE, TRANSMISSION, 6-SPEED AUTOMATIC, AXLE, 3.50 FINAL DRIVE RATIO, WHEELS, 18" (45.7 CM) BLACK PAINTED ALUMINUM, TIRES, 225/55R18 ALL-SEASON, BLACKWALL, OCEAN BLUE METALLIC, SEATS, FRONT BUCKET, EBONY SEATS AND INTERIOR WITH SANTORINI BLUE STITCHING, LEATHERETTE SEATS, AUDIO SYSTEM, 11" DIAGONAL HD COLOR TOUCHSCREEN, AM/FM STEREO., CONVENIENCE I PACKAGE, CONVENIENCE II PACKAGE, WIPERS, FRONT INTERMITTENT, RAINSENSE, LICENSE PLATE BRACKET, FRONT, LIFTGATE, POWER, SEATS, HEATED DRIVER AND FRONT PASSENGER, SEAT ADJUSTER, DRIVER 8-WAY POWER, SEAT ADJUSTER, 2-WAY POWER DRIVER LUMBAR CONTROL, STEERING WHEEL, HEATED, KEYLESS OPEN, FRONT DOORS, WIRELESS CHARGING Come and check out our full selection of new vehicles!     Convenience

    • GPS linked cruise control - Set it and forget it. Road trips used to be stressful, until GPS linked cruise control set the pace. Simply set the desired speed and the system uses GPS navigation data to maintain that speed without driver intervention - including slowing down for curves and anticipating hills. This can help minimize driver fatigue and improve overall fuel economy. Meet your ultimate co-pilot; GPS linked cruise control.

    Safety and Security

    • Forward collision mitigation - Forward thinking. You look away for just a second and suddenly the vehicle in front of you has stopped. That's when the forward collision mitigation system comes to life. When it senses an impending impact, it will activate a combination of features to help prevent or reduce the severity of an accident. Forward collision mitigation is always looking ahead.
    • Pedestrian impact prevention - An extra step toward safety. Pedestrians don't always stop, look, and listen, but with Pedestrian Impact Prevention, your vehicle is equipped to better see them and avoid them. This system constantly monitors the road ahead to identify and track pedestrians. It projects that image to an interior display screen, AND should an impact become likely, Pedestrian impact prevention takes steps to avoid a collision.
    • Hands-off cruise control with lane change - Set it and forget it. Road trips used to be stressful. Cruise control only managed speed, but not distance or safety. Now with hands-off cruise control with lane change simply set your desired speed and let sensor technology maintain a safe distance between you and surrounding vehicles with minimal steering input from you. It slows you down; speeds you up, and helps you make lane changes. Meet your ultimate co-pilot with hands-off cruise control with lane change.

  • Heated Driver and Front Outboard Passenger Seats
  • Heated 2nd Row Outboard Seats
  • 120-Volt Bed Mounted Power Outlet
  • 120-Volt Instrument Panel Power Outlet
  • Ventilated Driver and Front Passenger Seats
  • Manual Tilt-Wheel/telescoping Steering Column
  • 2-Speed Active Transfer Case
  • Sierra HD Pro Safety
  • Wireless Phone Projection
  • ProGrade Trailering System
  • Trailer Cam Provisions and Trailer Viewing Software
  • 2 Charge/data USB Ports Inside Center Console
  • 2 USB Ports
  • 2 Charge-Only Rear USB Ports

  • LED Cargo Area Lighting

AT4 Preferred Package

  • Power Sliding Rear Window with Defogger
  • LED Smoked Amber Roof Marker Lamps
  • Universal Home Remote

Safety and Security

  • Forward collision mitigation - Forward thinking. You look away for just a second and suddenly the vehicle in front of you has stopped. That's when the forward collision mitigation system comes to life. When it senses an impending impact, it will activate a combination of features to help prevent or reduce the severity of an accident. Forward collision mitigation is always looking ahead.
  • Pedestrian impact prevention - An extra step toward safety. Pedestrians don't always stop, look, and listen, but with Pedestrian Impact Prevention, your vehicle is equipped to better see them and avoid them. This system constantly monitors the road ahead to identify and track pedestrians. It projects that image to an interior display screen, AND should an impact become likely, Pedestrian impact prevention takes steps to avoid a collision.
  • Rear camera - Watching your back! The rear camera helps you see obstacles and hazards you otherwise couldn't by showing enhanced images of what is behind you. The rear camera is an extra set of eyes that's both convenient and safe.

Technology and Telematics

  • Apple CarPlay/Android Auto smart device wireless mirroring
  • Mobile hotspot - WiFi on the fly. Connect your devices to the Internet through your vehicle's private mobile hotspot and take the internet wherever your journey takes you, without eating up your data allowance. Find the hotspot with mobile hotspot.

Preferred Equipment Group 3SB

  • Front Bucket Seats
  • 4,850 lbs (2,200 Kgs) GVWR
  • 3.47 Final Drive Axle Ratio
  • 1.5L Turbo DOHC 4-Cylinder SIDI VVT Engine
  • Electronic 8-Speed Automatic Transmission with Overdrive
  • 17" Grazen Metallic Machined Aluminum Wheels
  • 235/65R17 All-Season Blackwall Tires
  • Premium Cloth Seat Trim
  • Premium GMC Infotainment System Radio

Safety and Security

  • Forward collision mitigation - Forward thinking. You look away for just a second and suddenly the vehicle in front of you has stopped. That's when the forward collision mitigation system comes to life. When it senses an impending impact, it will activate a combination of features to help prevent or reduce the severity of an accident. Forward collision mitigation is always looking ahead.
  • Pedestrian impact prevention - An extra step toward safety. Pedestrians don't always stop, look, and listen, but with Pedestrian Impact Prevention, your vehicle is equipped to better see them and avoid them. This system constantly monitors the road ahead to identify and track pedestrians. It projects that image to an interior display screen, AND should an impact become likely, Pedestrian impact prevention takes steps to avoid a collision.
  • Hands-on cruise control. Set it and forget it. Road trips used to be stressful. Cruise control only managed speed, but not distance or safety. Now, with hands-on cruise control, simply set your desired speed and let sensor technology maintain a safe distance between you and surrounding vehicles. It slows you down; speeds you up and even keeps you in your own lane. Meet your ultimate co-pilot with hands-on cruise control.
  • Rear camera - Watching your back! The rear camera helps you see obstacles and hazards you otherwise couldn't by showing enhanced images of what is behind you. The rear camera is an extra set of eyes that's both convenient and safe.

Technology and Telematics

  • Mobile hotspot - WiFi on the fly. Connect your devices to the Internet through your vehicle's private mobile hotspot and take the internet wherever your journey takes you, without eating up your data allowance. Find the hotspot with mobile hotspot.

entry.ns0:description:
The Napleton Auto Group promotes a no pressure buying experience that puts the customer in charge of the buying process, and for over 80 years, the Napleton family has made sure that absolutely nothing is more important than our commitment to your satisfaction. Our staff members are professional in every sense of the word, and receive regular training, including factory certification, so they are truly knowledgeable about the vehicles we offer. We want every customer's experience to be as timely, comfortable and ultimately as satisfying as it possible can be. You'll see it in every department of every Napleton Auto Group dealership. We hope you'll join the thousands of other satisfied customers that buy and service their vehicles the Napleton way. This 2026 GMC Terrain AWD Elevation offered in Riverstone Metallic will make a great addition to your family or business! Be sure to take note of all this vehicle has to offer:

Black Edition ($1,395 value)

  • 19" Gloss Black Painted Aluminum Wheels
  • Front and Rear Black GMC Emblems
  • Brushed Aluminum Roof Rails
  • Black Exterior Accents and Black Exterior Badging
  • Darkened Grille and C Shaped Surrounding Bezel
  • Black Mirror Caps

Preferred Equipment Group 3SB

    Safety and Security

    • Forward collision mitigation - Forward thinking. You look away for just a second and suddenly the vehicle in front of you has stopped. That's when the forward collision mitigation system comes to life. When it senses an impending impact, it will activate a combination of features to help prevent or reduce the severity of an accident. Forward collision mitigation is always looking ahead.
    • Pedestrian impact prevention - An extra step toward safety. Pedestrians don't always stop, look, and listen, but with Pedestrian Impact Prevention, your vehicle is equipped to better see them and avoid them. This system constantly monitors the road ahead to identify and track pedestrians. It projects that image to an interior display screen, AND should an impact become likely, Pedestrian impact prevention takes steps to avoid a collision.
    • Hands-on cruise control. Set it and forget it. Road trips used to be stressful. Cruise control only managed speed, but not distance or safety. Now, with hands-on cruise control, simply set your desired speed and let sensor technology maintain a safe distance between you and surrounding vehicles. It slows you down; speeds you up and even keeps you in your own lane. Meet your ultimate co-pilot with hands-on cruise control.
    • Rear camera - Watching your back! The rear camera helps you see obstacles and hazards you otherwise couldn't by showing enhanced images of what is behind you. The rear camera is an extra set of eyes that's both convenient and safe.

    Technology and Telematics

    • Mobile hotspot - WiFi on the fly. Connect your devices to the Internet through your vehicle's private mobile hotspot and take the internet wherever your journey takes you, without eating up your data allowance. Find the hotspot with mobile hotspot.
    Other notable features: ENGINE, 1.5L TURBO DOHC 4-CYLINDER, SIDI, VVT, TRANSMISSION, 8-SPEED AUTOMATIC, ELECTRONICALLY-CONTROLLED WITH OVERDRIVE, AXLE, 3.47 FINAL DRIVE RATIO, WHEELS, 19" (48.3 CM) GLOSS BLACK ALUMINUM PAINTED, TIRES, 235/55R19, ALL-SEASON BLACKWALL, RIVERSTONE METALLIC, SEATS, FRONT BUCKET, AFTER DARK, PREMIUM CLOTH SEAT TRIM, BLACK EDITION, ROOF RAILS, LICENSE PLATE FRONT MOUNTING PACKAGE, LPO, BLACK GMC EMBLEMS, FRONT AND REAR Come and check out our full selection of new vehicles! Quick Order Package 23D Laredo X ($500 value)

  • Laredo X

  • Rain Sensitive Windshield Wipers

Comfort

  • Heated steering wheel - A warm touch. Trying to drive with bulky winter gloves on isn't always easy. Keep your hands warm in cold temperatures so you can ditch the mitts and get a firm grip with this heated steering wheel.

Convenience

  • Power open and close liftgate - On-demand access. When your arms are full of cargo, the last thing you want to do is set it all down just to open the liftgate, then pick it all back up to load it in. By remotely opening and closing, power liftgate lets you skip straight to the loading. It also eliminates the awkward stretch to reach up for the liftgate to close it. Load and go with power open and close liftgate.
  • Keyfob engine start control - Get an early start. Remotely start your vehicle's engine from the key fob, ensuring your ride is ready to go when you get in. Now you can stay comfortable inside while your vehicle gets comfortable outside, thanks to Keyfob engine start control.

Safety and Security

  • Blind spot warning - Protect your blind side. You checked the mirror, looked over your shoulder and still nearly collided with the car next to you. Blind spot warning alerts you to the presence of a vehicle to your sides or rear so you know if you're about to make an unsafe lane change. Replace fear and uncertainty with confidence and safety with blind spot warning.

Technology and Telematics

  • Wireless connectivity - Strike the cord. Wireless technology makes it easy to place calls without having to fumble with your phone. It integrates your device with the system inside your vehicle for hands-free access. Keep connected and keep your hands on the wheel with wireless connectivity.

Safety and Security

  • Forward collision mitigation - Forward thinking. You look away for just a second and suddenly the vehicle in front of you has stopped. That's when the forward collision mitigation system comes to life. When it senses an impending impact, it will activate a combination of features to help prevent or reduce the severity of an accident. Forward collision mitigation is always looking ahead.
  • Pedestrian impact prevention - An extra step toward safety. Pedestrians don't always stop, look, and listen, but with Pedestrian Impact Prevention, your vehicle is equipped to better see them and avoid them. This system constantly monitors the road ahead to identify and track pedestrians. It projects that image to an interior display screen, AND should an impact become likely, Pedestrian impact prevention takes steps to avoid a collision.
  • Rear camera with washer - Watching your back! The rear camera helps you see obstacles and hazards you otherwise couldn't by showing enhanced images of what is behind you. Even if there are sloppy conditions, the washer keeps the camera's view clean. Rear camera with washer is an extra set of eyes that's both convenient and safe

Technology and Telematics

  • Mobile hotspot - WiFi on the fly. Connect your devices to the Internet through your vehicle's private mobile hotspot and take the internet wherever your journey takes you, without eating up your data allowance. Find the hotspot with mobile hotspot.

Safety and Security

  • Forward collision mitigation - Forward thinking. You look away for just a second and suddenly the vehicle in front of you has stopped. That's when the forward collision mitigation system comes to life. When it senses an impending impact, it will activate a combination of features to help prevent or reduce the severity of an accident. Forward collision mitigation is always looking ahead.
  • Pedestrian impact prevention - An extra step toward safety. Pedestrians don't always stop, look, and listen, but with Pedestrian Impact Prevention, your vehicle is equipped to better see them and avoid them. This system constantly monitors the road ahead to identify and track pedestrians. It projects that image to an interior display screen, AND should an impact become likely, Pedestrian impact prevention takes steps to avoid a collision.
  • Rear camera - Watching your back! The rear camera helps you see obstacles and hazards you otherwise couldn't by showing enhanced images of what is behind you. The rear camera is an extra set of eyes that's both convenient and safe.

Technology and Telematics

  • Apple CarPlay/Android Auto smart device wireless mirroring
  • Mobile hotspot - WiFi on the fly. Connect your devices to the Internet through your vehicle's private mobile hotspot and take the internet wherever your journey takes you, without eating up your data allowance. Find the hotspot with mobile hotspot.

This 2021 Audi Q5 Premium Plus offered in Manhattan Gray Metallic will make a great addition to your family or business! Be sure to take note of all this vehicle has to offer:

Convenience Package

  • Driver Seat Memory
  • Heated Steering Wheel
  • Audi Advanced Key
  • Auto-Dimming Power Folding Exterior Mirrors
  • SiriusXM All Access Service

Premium Plus Package ($4,800 value)

  • Panoramic Sunroof
  • Audi Phone Box
  • 19" 5-Double-arm Design Bi-Color Finish
  • Leatherette Covered Center Console and Door Armrests
  • Adaptive Cruise Control with Traffic Jam Assist
  • Audi Active Lane Assist
  • Audi Virtual Cockpit Plus
  • Hands-On Detection Steering Wheel
  • Top View Camera System
  • Convenience Package

Convenience

  • GPS linked cruise control - Set it and forget it. Road trips used to be stressful, until GPS linked cruise control set the pace. Simply set the desired speed and the system uses GPS navigation data to maintain that speed without driver intervention - including slowing down for curves and anticipating hills. This can help minimize driver fatigue and improve overall fuel economy. Meet your ultimate co-pilot; GPS linked cruise control.

Safety and Security

  • Hands-on cruise control. Set it and forget it. Road trips used to be stressful. Cruise control only managed speed, but not distance or safety. Now, with hands-on cruise control, simply set your desired speed and let sensor technology maintain a safe distance between you and surrounding vehicles. It slows you down; speeds you up and even keeps you in your own lane. Meet your ultimate co-pilot with hands-on cruise control.
  • Forward collision mitigation - Forward thinking. You look away for just a second and suddenly the vehicle in front of you has stopped. That's when the forward collision mitigation system comes to life. When it senses an impending impact, it will activate a combination of features to help prevent or reduce the severity of an accident. Forward collision mitigation is always looking ahead.
  • Pedestrian impact prevention - An extra step toward safety. Pedestrians don't always stop, look, and listen, but with Pedestrian Impact Prevention, your vehicle is equipped to better see them and avoid them. entry.title: 2024 Chevrolet Equinox LT
entry.ns0:description:
The Napleton Auto Group promotes a no pressure buying experience that puts the customer in charge of the buying process, and for over 80 years, the Napleton family has made sure that absolutely nothing is more important than our commitment to your satisfaction. Our staff members are professional in every sense of the word, and receive regular training, including factory certification, so they are truly knowledgeable about the vehicles we offer. We want every customer's experience to be as timely, comfortable and ultimately as satisfying as it possible can be. You'll see it in every department of every Napleton Auto Group dealership. We hope you'll join the thousands of other satisfied customers that buy and service their vehicles the Napleton way. No Accidents! This 2024 Chevrolet Equinox LT offered in Sterling Gray Metallic will make a great addition to your family or business! Be sure to take note of all this vehicle has to offer:

Preferred Equipment Group 1LT

    Safety and Security

    • Forward collision mitigation - Forward thinking. You look away for just a second and suddenly the vehicle in front of you has stopped. That's when the forward collision mitigation system comes to life. When it senses an impending impact, it will activate a combination of features to help prevent or reduce the severity of an accident. Forward collision mitigation is always looking ahead.
    • Pedestrian impact prevention - An extra step toward safety. Pedestrians don't always stop, look, and listen, but with Pedestrian Impact Prevention, your vehicle is equipped to better see them and avoid them. This system constantly monitors the road ahead to identify and track pedestrians. It projects that image to an interior display screen, AND should an impact become likely, Pedestrian impact prevention takes steps to avoid a collision.
    • Rear camera - Watching your back! The rear camera helps you see obstacles and hazards you otherwise couldn't by showing enhanced images of what is behind you. The rear camera is an extra set of eyes that's both convenient and safe.
    • Lane departure prevention - Keep it between the lines. It only takes a moment of inattention for your vehicle to drift. With lane departure prevention, your vehicle takes corrective action to help you avoid unintentionally moving out of your lane. Lane departure prevention is an extra level of safety for you and those around you.

    Technology and Telematics

    • Mobile hotspot - WiFi on the fly. Connect your devices to the Internet through your vehicle's private mobile hotspot and take the internet wherever your journey takes you, without eating up your data allowance. Find the hotspot with mobile hotspot.
    Other notable features: EMISSIONS, CONNECTICUT, DELAWARE, MAINE, MARYLAND, MASSACHUSETTS, NEW JERSEY, NEW YORK, OREGON, PENNSYLVANIA, RHODE ISLAND, VERMONT AND WASHINGTON STATE REQUIREMENTS, EMISSIONS OVERRIDE, FEDERAL, ENGINE, 1.5L TURBO DOHC 4-CYLINDER, SIDI, VVT, TRANSMISSION, 6-SPEED AUTOMATIC, ELECTRONICALLY-CONTROLLED WITH OVERDRIVE, AXLE, 3.50 FINAL DRIVE RATIO, WHEELS, 17" (43.2 CM) ALUMINUM, TIRES, P225/65R17 ALL-SEASON BLACKWALL, STERLING GRAY METALLIC, SEATS, FRONT BUCKET, JET BLACK, PREMIUM CLOTH SEAT TRIM, AUDIO SYSTEM, CHEVROLET INFOTAINMENT 3 SYSTEM, 7" DIAGONAL COLOR TOUCHSCREEN, AM/FM STEREO., LPO, FRONT AND REAR SPLASH GUARDS, CUSTOM MOLDED, LPO, BLACK BOWTIE EMBLEMS, FRONT AND REAR Napleton Downtown Chevrolet Buick GMC is proud to serve customers in communities throughout the Chicagoland area.
